mapper.select:
select t.mxid, t.mxmc, t.mxms, t.zb, t.bz, t.qxfs, to_char(t.cjsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') cjsj, t.cjr, t.bbh from znsjcl_cl_qxzhmx t where (t.qxfs = '0' or t.qxfs is null) and t.yxbz='Y'
and t.mxid = '${svo.mxid}'

select t.mxid, t.mxmc, t.mxms, t.zb, t.bz, t.qxfs, to_char(t.cjsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') cjsj, t1.user_name cjr, t.bbh from znsjcl_cl_qxzhmx t ,acl_user t1 where (t.qxfs = '0' or t.qxfs is null) and t.yxbz='Y' and t.cjr=t1.user_code(+)
and t.mxmc like '%${svo.con_mxmc}%'
and exists( select 1 from znsjcl_cl_qxzhzb t2 where t.zb = t2.zbid and t2.zbmc like '%${svo.con_zb}%' )
order by t.cjsj desc
select distinct t.mxid,t.xh,t1.zbmc,t1.zbid from znsjcl_cl_qxmxzb t , znsjcl_cl_qxzhzb t1 where 1=1 and t.zbid=t1.zbid(+) and t.mxid='${svo.mxid}' and t.yxbz='Y'
mapper.update: update znsjcl_cl_qxzhmx t set t.mxmc='${svo.mxmc}',t.mxms='${svo.mxms}', t.zb='${svo.zb}',t.bz='${svo.bz}' where t.mxid='${svo.mxid}'
update znsjcl_cl_qxzhmx t set t.yxbz='N' where t.mxid='${svo.mxid}'
update znsjcl_cl_qxmxzb t set t.yxbz='N' where t.mxid='${svo.mxid}'
mapper.select: select distinct r.zbid id,r.zbmc text from znsjcl_cl_qxzhzb r where 1=1 and r.yxbz='Y' -- and r.cjr ='${curuser}'
mapper.update: update znsjcl_cl_qxmxzb t set t.zbid='${svo.zbid}', t.yb='${svo.yb}', t.ybzd='${svo.ybzd}', t.mbb='${svo.mbb}', t.mbbzd='${svo.mbbzd}' , t.xh='${svo.xh}' , t.bz='${svo.bz}' where t.mxzbid ='${svo.mxzbid}'
mapper.delete: delete from znsjcl_cl_qxmxzb t where t.mxid='${svo.mxid}'
